strings: <voice_0x01000EE1><se_def>Prince Charmles: Bother! How dare it run away!? Don't these lizards realise I want to get this tiresome chore out of the way and return to the castle!?
<voice_0x01000EE2><se_def>Prince Charmles: Hmm, come to think of it, the Chancellor did say something about approaching them from behind so as not to frighten them off.

<voice_0x01000EE3><se_def>Prince Charmles: We'll never get close to them if you keep charging in like a herd of trolls.
I'm sure they wouldn't run away if you approached them more slowly.
<voice_0x01000EE4><se_def>Prince Charmles: I say, <leader>! How many times do I have to tell you!? You have to approach them quietly from behind otherwise they'll run away!
<voice_0x01000EE5><se_def>Prince Charmles: You just don't listen, do you!? DO YOU!?
<voice_0x01000EE6><se_def>Prince Charmles: For the thousandth time, you MUSTN'T run up to them! Walk up slowly from behind! S-L-O-W-L-Y from behind, understand!? SLOWLY!!!
<voice_0x01000EE7><se_def>Prince Charmles: I had no idea commoners were quite so stupid! Will you never catch on!? Now just you listen carefully to your master's voice this time!

<voice_0x01000EE8><se_def>Prince Charmles: You have to CREEP up on them SILENTLY
from BEHIND. What you have to NOT do
is run up to them noisily from the front!
UNDERSTAND!?
